intro: Anemone neelamiana, commonly known as the Neelam Anemone, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to the Himalayas. It features showy, cup-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink, often with a yellow center. The plant typically grows to a height of 30–60 cm and has finely divided, fern-like leaves. It thrives in cool, moist environments and is often found in shaded forest areas. The flowers bloom in early spring, adding a delicate touch to alpine and subalpine landscapes.
